title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Built a secure real-time chat platform with user authentication, private messaging, and chat room functionality. Implemented WebSockets for live communication, Spring Boot for backend APIs, and MySQL for data storage, ensuring scalability and data security.

title: Stock Trading Simulation System
description: Developed a stock trading simulator allowing users to practice trading, manage portfolios, and track performance. Designed frontend with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, backend with Spring Boot, and integrated databases like MySQL. Enhanced realism with external stock market data integration.

title: News Aggregator Website
description: Created a centralized platform to display news from multiple sources. Implemented frontend with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, backend with Spring Boot, and MySQL for data handling. Added features like news categorization, personalized feeds, and real-time updates via APIs.
